policies.inbound:
<set-variable name="requestBody" value="@{ return context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true); }" />
        @{
        var body = (Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)context.Variables["requestBody"];
        var fiscalCode = (string)context.Variables["fiscalCode"];
        body["fiscal_code"] = fiscalCode;
        return body.ToString();
    }
